caption: In a forest, a group of military officers on horseback ride through the woods. One of the officers dismounts and examines some firewood on the ground. He picks something up and holds it in his hand. Afterward, the officers depart. As they leave, a group of people emerges in the woods. Among them, a girl covered in mud crawls into a cave. Inside, there are many insects and a giant frog. The giant frog licks the girl. It spits out a sticky substance. Rain begins to pour from the sky. The officers head towards a car. Later, the officers and women are seen dining together at a table. In the dark of night, a woman carries a lamp and walks into the forest.
